post_title: T206 Period Sweet Caporal Cigarette Box
post_content:
Hi. eBay listed c1910's Sweet Caporal factory 30 cigarette box that is period correct for T206 baseball cards. A great "go with" collector piece!

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/185620879384[/url]

Open to direct offers until the first bid is placed.

Regards,
Jeff
listed now as sold for about $185 shipped....

Hi.  The box is still available.  The eBay buyer (Evan Swartz/etrain294) did not pay or respond to any messages.  Obviously now on my blocked list.

Jeff Forteza
